comments: Classes with Francisconi are, by far, the most relaxed classes I\'ve had at UMW. However, organization of the course is non-existent and discussion frequently wanders away from the point. Basically, I did not feel like I was getting my money\'s worth with this course.

He never took the time to know my name. I skipped class a lot and all you do is the same stuff everyday. It did not matter if I went to class or not. I knew what he talked about and what was for homework.
The class is boring and difficult, he is easily my least favorite professor at UMW. Fortunately I don\'t have to take any more classes with him.
totatlly awesome.. and loves to talk

Dr. Francisconi is one of the most amazing professors I\'ve ever encountered. Incredibly entertaining stories, use of books rather than textbooks, and a sincere desire to teach effectively make every single one of his classes worthwhile. Take his classes and change your perspective on capitalism forever! : )
